text: Lokho, futhi noma ngabe ngubani ohlonipha izinto ezingcwele zikaMvelinqangi ngakho-ke lokho kungcono kuyena eNkosini yakhe, futhi zenziwe zaba semthethweni kunina izinkomo ngaphandle kwalezo ezizomenyezelwa kunina ngakho-ke qhelelanani nokungcola kwezithixo futhi qhelelanani nenkulumo eyamanga
